#include <NumberFormat.h>

Detailed Description

This header file defines NumberFormat. 

   {
       Locale* lcl = new Locale("en", "US", "william");
       NumberFormat* numfmt = NumberFormat::getInstance(*lcl);
       if (numfmt)
       {
           printf("%s","instance create succ.\n");
           {
               double a = 123456;
               long long b = 123456;
               printf("format double is %s.\n",(&(numfmt->format(a)))->string());
               printf("format long is %s.\n",(&(numfmt->format(a)))->string());
               printf("getCurrency is %s.\n", (&(numfmt->getCurrency()))->string());
               {
                   gaia::base::String* stringtest = new gaia::base::String("$");
                   numfmt->setCurrency(*stringtest);
               }
               printf("getCurrency is %s.\n", (&(numfmt->getCurrency()))->string());
           }
           if(numfmt->isGroupingUsed())
           {
               printf("isGroupingUsed.\n");
           }
           else
           {
               printf("no isGroupingUsed.\n");
           }
           numfmt->setGroupingUsed(true);
           numfmt->setMaximumFractionDigits(100);
           numfmt->setMaximumIntegerDigits(100);
           numfmt->setMinimumFractionDigits(100);
           numfmt->setMinimumIntegerDigits(100);
           printf("getMaximumFractionDigits is %d.\n", numfmt->getMaximumFractionDigits());
           printf("getMaximumIntegerDigits is %d.\n", numfmt->getMaximumIntegerDigits());
           printf("getMinimumFractionDigits is %d.\n", numfmt->getMinimumFractionDigits());
           printf("getMinimumIntegerDigits is %d.\n", numfmt->getMinimumIntegerDigits());
           delete numfmt;
           numfmt = NULL;
       }
       else
       {
           printf("%s","instance create field.\n");
       }
   }
